alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued May 18 at 7:53AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 11 AM THIS MORNING... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from recent heavy rainfall WHERE...All islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through 11 am IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Active trough over the islands will continue to produce widespread showers with embedded thunderstorms causing floods and potential landslides. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 753 TAEAO ASO TOFI ME 18 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 11 I LE TAEAO NEI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 11 i le taeao nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o loo tumau i luga o le atunu`u, o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga fa`apea faititili, e mafua ai lologa fa`apea sologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
